author: Yadira Sanchez Olson
title: Holocaust survivor at Gurnee school: 'Be careful how you judge, young people'
text: Holocaust survivor at Gurnee school: 'Be careful how you judge, young people' Yadira Sanchez Olson   Elster is the author of "I Still See Her Haunting Eyes," a story about losing his sister during the Holocaust, and speaks of his survival during Nazi oppression in Poland. Aaron Elster is the author of "I Still See Her Haunting Eyes," a story about losing his sister during the Holocaust, and speaks of his survival during Nazi oppression in Poland. (Yadira Sanchez Olson
